memberdef.name: SQL_INSERT_INVENTORY_GEAR
memberdef.initializer: "INSERT INTO inventory_stores_gear (IG_IV_ID, IG_GR_ID, IG_EQUIPPED) VALUES (?, (SELECT GR_ID from gear WHERE GR_IDENT = ? LIMIT 1), ?);"

memberdef.name: SQL_INSERT_INVENTORY_POTION
memberdef.initializer: "INSERT INTO inventory_stores_potion (IP_IV_ID, IP_PO_ID) VALUES (?, (SELECT PO_ID from potion WHERE PO_TYPE = ? LIMIT 1));"

memberdef.name: SQL_SELECT_CHARACTER
memberdef.initializer: "SELECT PY_NAME, " \ "CH_MAXHEALTH, " \ "CH_MAXMANA, " \ "CH_MAXSTAMINA, " \ "CH_CURRENTHEALTH, " \ "CH_CURRENTMANA, " \ "CH_CURRENTSTAMINA, " \ "CH_ARMOR, " \ "CH_MAGICRESIST, " \ "CH_LEVEL, " \ "CH_XP, " \ "CH_XPREWARD, " \ "CH_SKILLPOINTS, " \ "CH_BASESTRENGTH, " \ "CH_BASEINTELLIGENCE, " \ "CH_BASEDEXTERITY, " \ "CH_BASECONSTITUTION, " \ "CH_CURRENTSTRENGTH, " \ "CH_CURRENTINTELLIGENCE, " \ "CH_CURRENTDEXTERITY, " \ "CH_CURRENTCONSTITUTION, " \ "CH_ID " \ "FROM player " \ "join main.character on CH_ID = player.PY_CH_ID " \ "where PY_PS_ID = ? LIMIT 1;"

memberdef.name: SQL_SELECT_GEAR
memberdef.initializer: "SELECT GR_IDENT " \ "FROM inventory " \ "join main.character_has_inventory chi on inventory.IV_ID = chi.CI_IV_ID " \ "join main.inventory_stores_gear isg on inventory.IV_ID = isg.IG_IV_ID " \ "join gear g on isg.IG_GR_ID = g.GR_ID " \ "where CI_CH_ID = ? " \ "AND IV_TYPE = 0 " \ "AND isg.IG_EQUIPPED = ?;"

memberdef.name: SQL_SELECT_POTION
memberdef.initializer: "SELECT PO_TYPE " \ "FROM inventory " \ "join main.character_has_inventory chi on inventory.IV_ID = chi.CI_IV_ID " \ "join main.inventory_stores_potion isp on inventory.IV_ID = isp.IP_IV_ID " \ "join potion p on isp.IP_PO_ID = p.PO_ID " \ "where CI_CH_ID = ? " \ "AND IV_TYPE = 1;"

memberdef.argsstring: (const db_connection_t *db_connection, const character_t character, const sqlite3_int64 game_state_id)
memberdef.name: save_character

briefdescription.para: This function saves the character to the database.

memberdef.argsstring: (const db_connection_t *db_connection, const character_t character, const sqlite3_int64 character_id)
memberdef.name: save_character_inventory

briefdescription.para: This function saves the character's inventory to the database.

parameterdescription.para: the character whose inventory to save

briefdescription.para: This function retrieves a character from the database.
Implements functionality to work with the character and the database.
